cr.title: Republican National Convention Law Enforcement
cr.excerpt: Mr. President, I rise to express a word of enthusiastic appreciation to the thousands of courageous and principled law enforcement members who did their utmost to allow the Republican National Convention in St. Paul to proceed in an orderly fashion. I saw some of their work with my own eyes and want them to know we respect them and the vital...

Senator GORDON SMITH of Oregon has matched that standard and the whole nation has benefited. I have always been encouraged and...

cr.title: 60th Anniversary of The Founding of Israel
